title: Webfont alternative for PTL Notes
content: Anyone knows a webfont alternative (typekit, google fonts) for [PTL Notes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418122936/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ptl_notes/)?
author: wildeweg

comments.content:
Ropa Sans? [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ropa+Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418122936/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ropa+Sans "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Ropa+Sans")  
(if you need more weight, you'll need to self-host it: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettersoup/ropa-sans-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418122936/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettersoup/ropa-sans-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lettersoup/ropa-sans-pro/"))
